if( String(chapter.baseUrl).indexOf(Get("url")) !== -1 ){
var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);

if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "è¯·åˆ·æ–°é‡è¯•æˆ–ç‚¹å¼€ä¸Šæ–¹ç« èŠ‚é“¾æ¥è¿›è¡ŒéªŒè¯";

else{
newUrl = Get("url") + chapter.url;
chapter.baseUrl = newUrl;
html = java.ajax(newUrl);
document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}
	});
	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();
}

const timestamp = Date.now();
let url = "https://api.next.bspapp.com/client";
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
	"timestamp": timestamp
};

let sign = createSign(body);

let headers = {
	"Content-Type": "application/json",
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"x-serverless-sign": sign
};

let response = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body),headers).body());

if(response.success){
	const accessToken = response.data.accessToken;
	const idValue = baseUrl.match(/id=([^&]+)/)[1];

	const timestamp1 = Date.now();
	const params = JSON.stringify({
		"functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
		"functionArgs": {
			"command": {
				"$db": [
					{ "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-novel"] },
					{ "$method": "where", "$param": [`_id=='${idValue}'`] },
					{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,cover_url,title,tags,word_number,view_count,excerpt,introduction,creator_id,creator_name,creator_avatar,is_completed,novel_status,contributor"] },
					{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
					{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [20] },
					{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
				]
			}
		}
	});
	let body1 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp1,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign1 = createSign(body1);
	let headers1 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign1
	};
	let response1 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body1),headers1).body());
	
	const timestamp2 = Date.now();
	const params2 = JSON.stringify({
	  "functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
	  "functionArgs": {
		"command": {
		  "$db": [
			{ "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-chapter"] },
			{ "$method": "where", "$param": ["novel_id=='" + idValue + "'&&chapter_status==1"] },
			{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,chapter_title,last_modify_date"] },
			{ "$method": "orderBy", "$param": ["chapter_index asc"] },
			{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
			{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [500] },
			{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
		  ]
		}
	  }
	});
	let body2 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params2,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp2,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign2 = createSign(body2);
	let headers2 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign2
	};
	let response2 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body2),headers2).body());

        response1.data.data[0].latestChapter = response2.data.data[response2.data.data.length - 1].chapter_title;
	result = response1;
}result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}
	});
	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();
}
const timestamp = Date.now();
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
	"timestamp": timestamp
};

let sign = createSign(body);

let headers = {
	"Content-Type": "application/json",
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"x-serverless-sign": sign
};

let response = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body),headers).body());

if(response.success){
	const accessToken = response.data.accessToken;
	const idValue = baseUrl.match(/id=([^&]+)/)[1];

	const timestamp2 = Date.now();
	const params2 = JSON.stringify({
	  "functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
	  "functionArgs": {
		"command": {
		  "$db": [
			{"$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-chapter"]},
			{"$method": "where", "$param": [{"_id": idValue}]},
			{"$method": "get", "$param": []}
		  ]
		}
	  }
	});
	let body2 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params2,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp2,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign2 = createSign(body2);
	let headers2 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign2
	};
	let response2 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body2),headers2).body());
	result = response2.data.data[0].chapter_content;
}result;
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}
	});
	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();
}
const timestamp = Date.now();
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
	"timestamp": timestamp
};

let sign = createSign(body);

let headers = {
	"Content-Type": "application/json",
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"x-serverless-sign": sign
};

let response = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body),headers).body());

if(response.success){
	const accessToken = response.data.accessToken;
	const timestamp2 = Date.now();
        let orderBy = "";
        if( baseUrl.match(/view_count/) ) orderBy = "view_count";
        else orderBy = "publish_date";
	const params2 = JSON.stringify({
    "functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
    "functionArgs": {
        "command": {
            "$db": [
                {"$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-novel"]},
                {"$method": "where", "$param": [{"novel_status": 1, "publish_date": {"$db": [{"$method": "command"}, {"$method": "gte", "$param": [1672502400000]}]}}]},
                {"$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,title,excerpt,creator_id,creator_name,creator_avatar,is_completed,cover_url,tags,word_number,view_count,novel_status"]},
                {"$method": "orderBy", "$param": [orderBy+" desc"]},
                {"$method": "skip", "$param": [0]},
                {"$method": "limit", "$param": [500]},
                {"$method": "get", "$param": [{}]}
            ]
        }
    }
});
	let body2 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params2,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp2,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign2 = createSign(body2);
	let headers2 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign2
	};
	let response2 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body2),headers2).body());
	result = JSON.stringify(response2);
}result;
</js>

	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}

	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();

const timestamp = Date.now();
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",

	"Content-Type": "application/json",

        const keyword = decodeURIComponent(baseUrl).match(/"([^"]+)"/)[1];
	const timestamp2 = Date.now();
	const params2 = JSON.stringify({
    "functionTarget": "DCloud-clientDB",
    "functionArgs": {
        "command": {
            "$db": [
                { "$method": "collection", "$param": ["bl-time-novel"] },
                 { "$method": "where", "$param": ["\"novel_status\" != 0 && (/" + keyword + "/i.test(title) || /" + keyword + "/i.test(creator_name))"] },
                { "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,title,excerpt,creator_id,creator_name,is_completed,cover_url,tags,view_count,word_number,novel_status,publish_date"] },
                { "$method": "orderBy", "$param": ["publish_date desc"] },
                { "$method": "limit", "$param": [200] },
                { "$method": "get", "$param": [] }
            ]
        }
    }
});
	let body2 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params2,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp2,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign2 = createSign(body2);
	let headers2 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
		"x-basement-token": accessToken,
		"x-serverless-sign": sign2
	};
	let response2 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body2),headers2).body());
	result = JSON.stringify(response2);
}result;
</js>
